Navigate through challenging levels, showcasing your skills with movement, jumps, double jumps, wall walks, and fireball attacks. But beware, as you face off against dangerous traps like arrows, fire, and a menacing spike ball that hunts you down. You must also outsmart a formidable knight enemy guarding a secret location. Join the adventure now!", imagecharacter: "Images/Projects/HeroHop/6.png", imagesDesktop: ["Images/Projects/HeroHop/1.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/2.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/3.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/4.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/5.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/6.png"] }, { id: 2, name: "Survive The Shadows", subname: "2D Platformer Game", GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Survive_the_shadows", Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/Survive_the_shadows_URL/", videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA", date: "12/2023 – 02/2024", description: "

Survive the Shadows

A Thrilling 2D Platformer Adventure

Dive into the action-packed world of Survive the Shadows, where bravery and skill are your greatest allies. In this immersive 2D platformer game, you'll step into the boots of a courageous hero with a versatile arsenal of moves and abilities to battle against menacing foes and survive the perils of the shadows.

Game Features

  • Dynamic Combat System
    Unleash powerful sword attacks with three unique moves, including a devastating jump attack featuring two special maneuvers. Master the art of ranged combat by throwing arrows to defeat enemies from afar.
  • Challenging Enemies
    Face off against a relentless Knight, a vigilant guardian who patrols areas and turns intelligently upon detecting walls or edges. Beware of the menacing FlyingEye, a deadly foe that patrols the skies and attacks when you enter its range.
  • Immersive Gameplay Elements
    • Health Pickups: Collect health pickups to stay in the fight and prolong your journey through the shadows.
    • Cinemachine Integration: Experience smooth and cinematic camera transitions that enhance gameplay immersion.
    • Advanced Input System: Seamless and responsive controls powered by Unity’s Input System.
    • 2D Tilemap Editor: Beautifully designed levels crafted using the powerful 2D Tilemap Editor, delivering stunning visuals and immersive environments.

Why Play Survive the Shadows?

Explore a world filled with danger, action, and adventure. Test your skills against challenging enemies, navigate dynamic levels, and experience the satisfaction of mastering a versatile combat system. Survive the Shadows is more than just a game—it’s a journey into the heart of darkness where only the strongest survive.

Play Now!

Ready to embark on this epic adventure? Play Survive the Shadows and prove your mettle in a world where every shadow hides a new challenge.

const projectsAPI = [ { id: 1, name: "Hero Hop", subname: "2D Platformer Game", GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Hero_Hop", Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/HeroHop_Game_URL/", videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA", date: "12/2023 – 02/2024", description: "Welcome to HeroHop, an exciting 2D platformer game where you play as a brave dragon with unique abilities. Navigate through challenging levels, showcasing your skills with movement, jumps, double jumps, wall walks, and fireball attacks. But beware, as you face off against dangerous traps like arrows, fire, and a menacing spike ball that hunts you down. You must also outsmart a formidable knight enemy guarding a secret location. Collect health items to stay in the fight and conquer two thrilling levels. Are you ready to take on the challenge and save the day? Join the adventure now!", imagecharacter: "Images/Projects/HeroHop/6.png", imagesDesktop: [ "Images/Projects/HeroHop/1.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/2.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/3.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/4.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/5.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/6.png", ], }, { id: 2, name: "Survive The Shadows", subname: "2D Platformer Game", GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Survive_the_shadows", Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/Survive_the_shadows_URL/", videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA", date: "12/2023 – 02/2024", description: "

Survive the Shadows

A Thrilling 2D Platformer Adventure

Dive into the action-packed world of Survive the Shadows, where bravery and skill are your greatest allies. In this immersive 2D platformer game, you'll step into the boots of a courageous hero with a versatile arsenal of moves and abilities to battle against menacing foes and survive the perils of the shadows.

Game Features

  • Dynamic Combat System
    Unleash powerful sword attacks with three unique moves, including a devastating jump attack featuring two special maneuvers. Master the art of ranged combat by throwing arrows to defeat enemies from afar.
  • Challenging Enemies
    Face off against a relentless Knight, a vigilant guardian who patrols areas and turns intelligently upon detecting walls or edges. Beware of the menacing FlyingEye, a deadly foe that patrols the skies and attacks when you enter its range.
  • Immersive Gameplay Elements
    • Health Pickups: Collect health pickups to stay in the fight and prolong your journey through the shadows.
    • Cinemachine Integration: Experience smooth and cinematic camera transitions that enhance gameplay immersion.
    • Advanced Input System: Seamless and responsive controls powered by Unity’s Input System.
    • 2D Tilemap Editor: Beautifully designed levels crafted using the powerful 2D Tilemap Editor, delivering stunning visuals and immersive environments.

Why Play Survive the Shadows?

Explore a world filled with danger, action, and adventure. Test your skills against challenging enemies, navigate dynamic levels, and experience the satisfaction of mastering a versatile combat system. Survive the Shadows is more than just a game—it’s a journey into the heart of darkness where only the strongest survive.

Play Now!

Ready to embark on this epic adventure? Play Survive the Shadows and prove your mettle in a world where every shadow hides a new challenge.
